intros.title: Welcome to WorldBridger One
intros.speaker: Host
intros.text: Welcome to WorldBridger One - where environmental action meets cultural expression, where technology empowers communities, and where every voice matters in building a sustainable future.

intros.title: Artist Showcase Opening
intros.speaker: MC
intros.text: Tonight we celebrate the voices that rise from the heart of our community. From Kakuma to the global stage, these artists carry stories of resilience, hope, and transformation.

intros.title: Battle Tournament Opening
intros.speaker: Battle Host
intros.text: Let the words fly! Welcome to the WorldBridger Battle Arena where creativity clashes, metaphors meet, and the best bars win. May the most skilled wordsmith prevail!

intros.title: Educational Summit Opening
intros.speaker: Educator
intros.text: Knowledge is power, and today we empower each other. Welcome to our environmental science summit where learning meets action, where data drives change, and where every student becomes a teacher.

intros.title: Community Day Welcome
intros.speaker: Community Leader
intros.text: Today we gather not just as individuals, but as a community united by purpose. From every corner of our network, we come together to celebrate progress, share stories, and build the future we deserve.
